description: This Python script demonstrates the use of shared memory between two agents, one for chatting and one for research, utilizing various modules for memory management, AI models, and tools.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of performing tasks such as chatting or research, with configurable models, memory, and tools.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Handles shared memory storage and retrieval for agents, backed by an SQLite database.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: Represents a Google Gemini AI model used by agents for generating responses.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Provides tools for querying DuckDuckGo search engine, used as an external tool for research agents.

methods.name: Memory.clear
methods.description: Resets or clears the memory storage.

methods.name: Memory.get_user_memories
methods.description: Retrieves memories associated with a specific user ID.

methods.name: Agent.print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response from the agent, optionally streaming.
